page.title: 08FLETCHING-HOBBIES & SPORTS
page.content: {BELLRINGERS.}There are 12 bellringers, half of them teenagers learning the skill, who practice weekly and ring the peal of eight at the church. {CHORAL SOCIETY.}The Fletching singers originating three years ago from a carol singing group and practice regularly. {THE BONFIRE SOCIETY }feature largely in village life and will be described on page 10. {THE CRICKET CLUB.}A successful club. their team was the first in Sussex to reach the last 16 finals of the Whitbread cup. Last season they were top of the East Sussex League. {FLETCHING ATHLETIC FOOTBALL CLUB}field two teams training weekly atMaresfield {THE WOMENS STOOLBALL TEAM }is flouishing.It began in Sussex.A mix of cricket & rounders it is reputed to have been played by Sussex milkmaids.
